Function Documentation

GfxFeatureMap* filterGfxMap (  GfxFeatureMap &  gfxMap,
const ServerTileMapFormatDesc &  mapDesc,
const TileMapParams &  param,
float64  meterToPixelFactor,
bool  removeNames = false
) 
 

Does the needful merging / filtering / removal of uninteresting items of the gfxmap.

Parameters:
gfxMap The gfxmap to filter. Note that this gfxmap will be modified by the method, and should not be used to anything else afterwards.
mapDesc The map format description.
param The TileMapParam for the importance.
meterToPixelFactor Meter to pixel factor. Used by the filtering.
removeNames If to remove all names in the gfxmap.
Returns:
A new:ed filtered GfxMap. Note that this gfxmap must be deleted by the caller of this method.

uint32 getFirstAngleDifferenceIndex (  const Stack &  filteredIndeces,
const GfxData &  gfx,
uint32  poly,
uint32  startIndexIn,
float64  distanceCutOff
) 
 

Determines the next index to use in the polygon, i.e whether to remove any indeces in between to do a straighter line.

Parameters:
filteredIndeces Contains index in to gfx polygon.
gfx Contains the coordinates
poly Polygon index in Gfx to filter.
startIndexIn Start index in filteredIndeces.
distanceCutOff The maximum distance before
Returns:
next index to be used in filteredIndeces.
